entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 a.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of rain or snow this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain or snow changing to 40 percent chance of snow near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
